ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment
Interface Layer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BackgroundLayer, EntityLayer, HudLayer, ParticleLayer, TileLayer
public interface Layer

Interface for Layers - logically seperate aspects of the display that can be updated and rendered on an individual basis. Layers should be attached to a Viewport to be rendered or updated.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Christopher Keefer
